description: For those who master motion itself, striking with purpose, balance, and perfect control.

talents.name: Martial Arts
talents.description: Through discipline, endurance, and focus, you've turned your body into a living weapon. Each motion becomes a calculated flow of balance, precision, and intent.

ranks.1: While unarmored and unshielded, your Armor Points = Agility modifier + Martial Rank. You regain these points after a long rest.
ranks.2: Your unarmed strike damage increases to 1d6 + Agility modifier. You may use Agility instead of Might for unarmed attacks.
ranks.3: Gain +1 to Initiative and +1 to Defense while unarmored.
ranks.4: Unarmed strike damage increases to 1d8 + Agility modifier. You may make two unarmed strikes as a single Attack action.
ranks.5: As a Bonus Action, enter Flow State for 1 minute: +2 to all melee attacks and Agility saving throws. Costs 1 Martial Point (you have Martial Points = Agility modifier).
ranks.6: Unarmed strike damage increases to 1d10 + Agility modifier. In Flow State, you may Disengage as part of your movement.
ranks.7: Gain +2 Defense while in Flow State. Martial Points regenerate after a short rest.
ranks.8: In Flow State, your movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.
ranks.9: During Flow State, you may make an extra attack as a Reaction against an enemy that misses you with a melee attack.
ranks.10: Unarmed strike damage increases to 1d12 + Agility modifier. While unarmored, gain +2 Defense Points and +10 ft movement speed. You may maintain Flow State indefinitely until you choose to end it.

talents.name: Balanced Stance
talents.description: You shift your weight with subtle precision, grounding each motion for stability and timing.

ranks.1: When you remain in the same space for your entire turn, gain +1 bonus to Defense until the start of your next turn.
ranks.2: When an enemy misses you with a melee attack, you may shift 5 ft in any direction without provoking opportunity attacks.
ranks.3: Defense bonus increases to +2. Once per short rest, when you would be knocked prone, you may remain standing.

talents.name: Defensive Stance
talents.description: You anchor your movements with perfect posture, turning defense into momentum and control.

ranks.1: Gain +1 Defense Point while not wearing heavy armor or using a shield. Gain advantage on saving throws against being knocked prone or pushed. When a creature misses you with a melee attack, you may shift 5 ft.
ranks.2: Once per short rest, when you take the Dodge action, also gain resistance to all damage until the start of your next turn.
ranks.3: Defense bonus increases to +2. When you shift after being missed, you may make an unarmed strike as a Reaction.

talents.name: Quick Hands
talents.description: You fight with fluid efficiency, turning reflex into motion and speed into precision.

ranks.1: Gain +2 bonus to Acrobatics and Sleight of Hand checks. You may draw or stow one weapon or item as part of any Action or Attack. Gain +1 to Melee Attack Bonus.
ranks.2: You can interact with one additional object each turn for free. Gain +1 to Initiative.
ranks.3: Once per turn, you may make a Sleight of Hand check to disarm an opponent as part of an Attack action.

talents.name: Terrain Flow
talents.description: You read your surroundings instinctively, adapting your movement to shifting ground and obstacles.

ranks.1: Gain +2 on Survival, you are now trained.
ranks.2: Difficult terrain caused by non-magical sources costs you no extra movement for 1 round after you Dash.
ranks.3: Once per long rest, when you enter difficult terrain, treat it as normal terrain for 1 minute. Gain advantage on saving throws against environmental hazards.

talents.name: Unencumbered Thought
talents.description: By emptying your mind of distraction, you act with instinctive precision and react faster than conscious thought.

ranks.1: Gain advantage on Initiative rolls. You can't be surprised while conscious. Gain +1 bonus to Agility saving throws.
ranks.2: Gain +1 to Defense and +1 to Agility saving throws. When you roll Initiative, you may move up to half your speed before combat begins.
ranks.3: Once per short rest, take two Reactions in a single round. Gain immunity to the Frightened condition.

talents.name: Vertical Ascension
talents.description: Your training allows you to defy gravity for brief moments, using momentum, balance, and precision to scale vertical surfaces with supernatural efficiency.

ranks.1: You may move up vertical surfaces for up to 10 feet as part of your movement, but must end your turn on solid ground or fall.
ranks.2: When you Dash, you may run along walls or ceilings for your full movement, ending on solid ground.
ranks.3: You may end your turn on a vertical surface or ceiling. Gain a climb speed equal to your walking speed.

talents.name: Master of Martial
talents.description: You have achieved the ultimate synthesis of mind, motion, and will.

ranks.1: While unarmored, gain +2 Defense and +2 to all saving throws. Your unarmed strike critical range expands to 18â€“20. You radiate a passive Flow Aura: Enemies that begin their turn within 5 ft of you must make a Wisdom save (TN = 8 + your Agility modifier + your level), if they fail they have disadvantage on attacks against you until the start of their next turn.
